Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after); 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Bowl
Description: Large deep bowl with a flat circular base. The body widens nearer the top. The vase is misshapen in the uppermost section. There are large white patches, particularly on the inside.
